question:
Which of the Ozone Depleting Substances are produced in India?
1) CFC-11
2) CFC-12
3) CFC-13
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Some of the Ozone Depleting Substances which are produced in India are CFC-11, CFC-12, CFC-113, Halon-1211, HCFC-22, Halon-1301, Carbon tetrachloride, methyl chloroform and methyl bromide. These are used in refrigeration and air conditioning, fire fighting, electronics, etc.
